mapper.select: SELECT pc.project_code AS project_code,pc.project_name AS project_name,pc.communitycode AS communitycode,pc.charge AS charge,pc.datestart AS datestart,pc.funds AS funds, pf.account AS account,pf.accountcount AS accountcount,pf.pay AS pay ,pf.paycount AS paycount ,pf.balance AS balance,pf.projectfundid as projectfundid FROM `projectfunds` pf JOIN `project_column` pc ON pc.project_id=pf.projectid
